Contact Us Contact Us Mailing Address: The Henry Nehrling Society, Inc. P.O. Box 884 Gotha, FL 34734-0884 Physical Address: Nehrling Gardens 2267 Hempel Ave Gotha, FL 34734 Phone Number: +1-407-445-9977 Email: info@nehrlinggardens.org Private tours are available by appointment only, $10 donation per person with a minimum of $30 per tour, while we work to rehabilitate the historic home and gardens. Membership See More ▾ Donate Membership Wish List Plant ID Marker Sponsorship Membership Members of our organization are highly valuable in providing essential operational funding. There are varying levels of memberships available, all of which bring value to Nehrling Gardens and our efforts to preserve history and educate generations. Membership Level Annual Cost Welcome Gift for new Members Invite to Annual Member Only Event 10% Discount on Event Tickets 10% Discount on Gift Shop & Plant Sales Student/ Senior (60+) $15 ▪ ▪ Individual $25 ▪ ▪ ▪ Family $40 ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ Sustaining $100 ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ Patron (Lifetime) $1000 (one time) ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ To sign-up for membership, renew your current membership or upgrade to another level please visit our membership site: Membership /#content /#wrap Come spend a day at this Florida Heritage Landmark 2267 Hempel Ave Gotha, FL 34734 407-445-9977 Sign up for our newsletter Stay up to date with all things regarding Nehrling Gardens.
